title: Experience
question: Do you have any experience with drug use, either personally or through someone you know?
options: I have personally used drugs before
Someone close to me has used drugs
I'm not a drug user/know anyone that does

title: Substance Use
question: Do you have any experience using substances recreationally, or are you/someone close dealing with addiction or dependency?

title: Familiarity
question: How much do you know about safe substance use and responding to a drug overdose?
